!** Unique values assignment
!|Script       |DateUtil                               |
|$unique=      |getCurrentDateTimeStamp;|yMMddHHmmss   |

|$loadingDate= |getCurrentDateTimeStamp |iso           |
|$contractDate=|dateCalculation;        |dd-MMM-yyyy|2 |

!|Script       |Common                                         |
|$truckoutdate=|stringConcatenation;|$truckoutdate|!- $timer -!|

!** Uploading Material
!define row {DELIVERY NO.,Material,Billed Quantity,Billed Quantity Unit,Weight,Weight Unit,Volume,Volume unit,Category,Depot,Ship to Party,Customer,Invoice Amount,Billing Doc,Billing Dt.,MRP Price,Taxable Amount,HSN No.,CGST Rate,SGST Rate,IGST Rate,CGST Amt,IGST Amt,SGST Amt,LINE ITEM}

!|Script    |Common                                         |

!|Script  |Excel                      |
|newSheet;|${row}|${column}|$excelpath|

!|Script                     |Ui                                                                                                                                                               |

|waitForElementToBeDisplayed;|//div[contains(@class,'card-content')]|xpath                                                                                                          |30        |
|sendKeys;                   |.upload-material                      |cssselector                                                                                                    |$excelpath|
|check                       |isElementPresent;                     |//div[contains(@class,'scrolling-left') or contains(@class,'scrolling-none')]//span[contains(text(),'INV1000')]|xpath|true|

!|Script               |FileUtil           |

!|Script  |Ui                                                                                         |
|sendKeys;|//input[@class='el-upload__input']|xpath                                        |$pdfpath  |

|$tresult=|isElementPresent;                 |//span[@class='el-upload-list__item-preview']|xpath     |
